message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and am eager to facilitate this acquisition. For this unique offering, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This amount reflects not only the current market conditions but also acknowledges the substantial worth you perceive in the product. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between our interests, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.
